remarks: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution.  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
cbvraldva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = y ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvraldva $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps <-> A. y e. A ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
